item.title: Loose (?)/unsafe manhole cover in road, 11th October
item.description:
The manhole cover is moving & clunking every time that a car, van etc passes over it, indicating that it is not correctly fitting any more. It never used to do that. It could lead to a more damaging scenario for the road & would be dangerous for those on motorbikes or bicycles if not sitting correctly and moves when travelled on.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 49a, 49b, Selby Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
